attributes.action: fair wages means a fair society
attributes.additional_details:
what is the difference between you me and the Prime minister?
well you may happen to be female and 7 ft tall and weigh 50st but you are still human and we all live in a society that says we a key aka a job in order to obtain another key which is money aka wages which we use to pay our bills and feed and clothe ourselves.
fair enough...but my question is how is it that MP'S are paid more than the average wage while you and I are expected to survive on much less?
this means that when we are told the cost of heating our flats is to rise in december, we get worried while it's unlikely MP'S feel worried simply cause they get paid much more than you and I.
New Labour said Britain Deserves Better...where exactly is there evidence to prove Britan has got Better?
when MP'S start to fret like we do when we are told Gas and electricity is to become expensive
then and only then will I believe Britain is at long last Better.
